conbody.p: The release notes for Eucalyptus are divided by release number, presented in order from current release to past releases. If you are already using Eualyptus, you can check updates from your older release and compare it with a later release to help determine if you want to upgrade.

section.title: How to Upgrade
section.p: If you want to upgrade to the current release, you can find upgrade information in the Eucalyptus Installation Guide.
